review: The audio and video are almost never in sync when I use this device. I've never experienced this issue with the Roku, which I've had for years. I would put up with a slight lack of sync, but this is radically out of sync -- by several seconds. I've researched what to do about this and have followed the suggestions to cast at standard resolution and keep all devices close to the router -- it hasn't helped. Personally I find this device too frustrating to be useful. I end up buying shows that I could have cast. I think it's a great idea but the technology doesn't seem to be there yet.
